name: Clean The Ocean (kidcodert)
description:
A game about cleaning the ocean in the most dangerous part of the ocean. Use the arrow keys or WASD to move and collect trash while avoiding the whirlpools and deadly goo. You can also open up a shop in which you can upgrade your boat. The main objective is to collect as much trash as possible.

This is my very first game jam and also my very first actual custom game. Hope it's good.

The game has a huge inspiration from barjis own safe the ocean game and has taken a lot of code for the boat movement from techwithtim.  Would like to know if there are anyways to improve on this game. or if there are any bugs you encountered(Wouldnt be too surprised though) pls do tell me so I can upgrade the game and fix the bug. 

Also if you're a tech geek like me, I have hosted this game on GitHub so you can see it and tell me if my code could be written better to increase the fps or just for better readability, Thank you

here is the link to the Github page: https://github.com/KidCoderT/SeaJamSaveTheOceanGame

Also for the background music / Main Music: Robotertanz by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com do visit really cool place for music

A huge thanks go to all my friends and my brother  who playtested the game and found the awesome background music/

(All the assets and coding were made by me and created during the jam)
